name: CLHeading
desc: The azimuth (orientation) of the userâ€™s device, relative to true or magnetic north.

items.name: var magneticHeading: CLLocationDirection
items.desc: The heading (measured in degrees) relative to magnetic north.

items.name: var trueHeading: CLLocationDirection
items.desc: The heading (measured in degrees) relative to true north.

items.name: var headingAccuracy: CLLocationDirection
items.desc: The maximum deviation (measured in degrees) between the reported heading and the true geomagnetic heading.

items.name: var timestamp: Date
items.desc: The time at which this heading was determined.

items.name: var x: CLHeadingComponentValue
items.desc: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the x-axis.

items.name: var y: CLHeadingComponentValue
items.desc: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the y-axis.

items.name: var z: CLHeadingComponentValue
items.desc: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the z-axis.

items.name: typealias CLHeadingComponentValue
items.desc: A type used to report magnetic differences reported by the onboard hardware.
